reviewText: bought this for my 3 year old grandson who had seen an ad for it on another dvd.  he loves it and so does his 1 year old sister.  finally a dvd they both like. wish they were sold in stores.  although it took a while to get here it (my grandson was anxious to get it) it came in very good condition.

This is a cute PBS series that I discovered by accident once while we were travelling and my son was bored.  He immediately loved the video and I ordered more through Amazon. I have seen the toys for sale at various places as well, and he played with them for hours. They are educational, cute, and fun.
